properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA out 10 nm; Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 12 at 2:57AM PST until January 14 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
seas 11 to 15 feet expected.

* WHERE...Out to 60 nm from Point St George to Point Arena.

* WHEN...Until 9 PM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The northwest swell of 12 to 14 feet at 14
seconds is expected persist through the middle of the week.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST TUESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 3 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING
